text: 9:5 Matyu 10:14; Mak 6:11; Aposel 13:51Eghtɨ gumazamiziba ia gifueghan koghtɨ, dughiar ia men nguibam ataghɨraghamim, ia uan dagaribar mɨneziba apɨsigh, eghtɨ me fogh suam, arazir me amizir kam, a derazir puvatɨ.”9:5 Judabar arazim kara, nɨ me baraghan koghtɨma, me nɨn sagh, uan dagarir asuaba mɨneziba apɨzighɨva nɨ ategh igharagh mangam. Ezɨ en arazim kamakɨn, kɨ nɨ mɨkɨmtɨ nɨ na baraghan koghtɨ, kɨ apem apɨrigh uan tuavim gighuvagh, suam, kɨ nɨn sagham.
